name: Echoes of Heroes: Legends Never Die
storyline:
Recruit Heroes, Battle Monsters, Travel The Land, Unlock Your Heroes' Hidden Power, Complete Quests, and Defeat The Evil Plaguing The Land. Or Die Trying.

In this turn-based Hero party builder, guide your Heroes on quests, battles, and adventures to bring peace to the land. Recruit new Heroes, select the best party, and face the challenge of finding and convincing these extraordinary individuals to join your guild. Losing a Hero along the way? Head back to the guild to pick up replacements and continue your quest. Explore diverse regions with unique biomes, settlements, and cultures. Uncover hidden evils before their chaotic corruption spreads. Time is of the essence, so don't delay in finishing quests or rescuing captured Heroes; become Legends if your party prevails.
summary: Pixel Art Roguelite Fantasy Team Builder Turn-Base RPG
